name: Project Rabbit Hole
description:
Welcome to Project Rabbit hole.

This is a short demo of a widely branching game, where your actions and choices lead to similar, and yet different, consequences.

The game's lore is deep and detailed, and you will be able to catch a few glimpses of it in this demo.

It will probably take you around 5 minutes to complete your first playthrough, but there's more to discover than meets the eye.

I'd love to hear feedback for you - what you liked, what you disliked, what you found entertaining, what you considered boring, what made sense, what didn't. Bugs, too, if you happen to stumble upon. Put any of that in the comments, or contact me @ creeepling@gmail.com.

Oh, and character sprites are currently placeholders, and no music/sound. :(

Hope you enjoy the demo!
